MS.S: This resource module contains DSC resources used to apply and manage local group policies by modifying the respective .pol file.

## [1.2.0] - 2020-03-13_x000A__x000D__x000A_### Added_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- GPRegistryPolicyDsc_x000D__x000A_ - Add support to upload coverage to Codecov.io ([issue #16](https://github.com/dsccommunity/GPRegistryPolicyDsc/issues/16))._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Fixed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- GPRegistryPolicyDsc_x000D__x000A_ - Update GitVersion.yml with the correct regular expression._x000D__x000A_ - Added GPT.ini creation/updating logic in order to properly apply Group Policy._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Changed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- GPRegistryPolicyDsc_x000D__x000A_ - Set a display name on all the jobs and tasks in the CI pipeline._x000D__x000A_ - Change the Azure Pipelines Microsoft Host Agents to use the image _x000D__x000A_ `windows-2019` ([issue #15](https://github.com/dsccommunity/GPRegistryPolicyDsc/issues/15))._x000A__x000A_## [1.1.0] - 2020-01-05_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Added_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- GPRegistryPolicyDsc_x000D__x000A_ - Added continuous delivery with a new CI pipeline._x000A__x000A_## [1.0.1] - 2019-09-29_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Fixed [#3](https://github.com/dsccommunity/GPRegistryPolicyDsc/issues/3)_x000D__x000A_- Updated release logic to not include .git folder._x000A__x000A_## [1.0.0] - 2019-09-18_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Initial release.

This resource module contains DSC resources used to apply and manage local group policies by modifying the respective .pol file.
